changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE post_label ( post_id BIGINT NOT NULL, label_id BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (post_id, label_id), CONSTRAINT fk_post_label_post FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES post(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_post_label_label FOREIGN KEY (label_id) REFERENCES label(id) ON DELETE CASCADE );
